title: Fokus Agency
description: Working at Fokus Agency, I build modern, scalable front-end solutions using React and Webflow, balancing performance with flexibility for content-driven platforms. My work emphasizes clean code, accessibility, and seamless user experiences across devices.

title: Scorpbit Technologies
description: At Scorpbit Technologies, I worked as a Frontend Developer delivering responsive, production-ready web applications using Angular, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I collaborated closely with project managers, backend developers, QA teams, and clients to solve complex UI challenges, optimize performance, and ensure consistent user experiences across a wide range of devices.

title: Digital Poin8
description: At Digital Poin8, I built responsive WordPress-based websites using HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript, focusing on clean UI implementation and performance across devices.
